Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47235 affecting package frr for versions less than 9.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-47235 affecting package frr for versions less than 9.1-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package frr is earlier than 9.1-2, affected by CVE-2023-47235
